emptyFilesPane.title: The folder is empty.

filterFilesEmpty.title: Nothing found.

codes.11: The resource type was not specified in the request.
codes.12: The requested resource type is invalid.
codes.13: The connector configuration file is invalid.
codes.103: It was not possible to complete the request due to authorization restrictions.
codes.104: It was not possible to complete the request due to file system permission restrictions.
codes.111: It was not possible to complete the request due to resulting file size.
codes.115: A file or folder with the same name already exists.
codes.116: Folder not found. Please refresh and try again.
codes.117: File not found. Please refresh the files list and try again.
codes.118: Source and target paths are equal.
codes.201: A file with the same name already exists. The uploaded file was renamed to "{name}".
codes.203: Invalid file. The file size is too big.
codes.205: No temporary folder is available for upload on the server.
codes.206: Upload canceled due to security reasons. The file contains HTML-like data.
codes.207: The uploaded file was renamed to "{name}".
codes.500: The file browser is disabled for security reasons. Please contact your system administrator and check the CKFinder configuration file.

errors.deleteFilePermissions: Removing files is not allowed in this folder.
errors.fileInvalidCharacters: The file name cannot contain any of the following characters: {disallowedCharacters}
errors.fileNameNotEmpty: The file name cannot be empty.
errors.folderInvalidCharacters: The folder name cannot contain any of the following characters: {disallowedCharacters}
errors.incorrectExtension: File extension is not allowed in this folder.
errors.missingFile: The requested file is no longer available.
errors.missingFolder: The folder you are trying to reach is no longer available.
errors.noUploadFolderSelected: Please select a folder before uploading.
errors.renameFilePermissions: Renaming files is not allowed in this folder.
errors.unknown: It was not possible to complete the request. (Error {number})
